PEDRO is a celebration and dramatized chronicle of the life of Pedro Zamora, the gay, HIV-positive Cuban-American whose role as a third-season cast member of MTV's THE REAL WORLD was a social and pop-cultural watershed. ... Full DescriptionZamoraÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢s tragic death in 1994 at the age of 22 touched the hearts of millions of fans. Included along with the feature are three episodes of THE REAL WORLD: SAN FRANCISCO.

The made-for-TV Pedro makes its way to DVD this week, boasting a script by Milk Oscar-winner Dustin Lance Black. It could be argued that both films slightly suffer from the impossibility of finding an actor to be as charismatic as the real-life person depictedÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½especially when that person has been extensively captured on film in real lifeÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½but Alex Loynaz takes a valiant stab at portraying Pedro Zamora, the AIDS activist whose stint on MTV's The Real World made him one of pop culture's most visible gay men. The film definitely benefits from producers Richard Glatzer and Wash Westmoreland (QuinceaÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â±era) and their knowledge of the inner workings of reality TV.

Starring Teresa Hernandez, Matt Barr, Justina Machado, Hale Appleman, Dajuan Johnson, Jenn Liu, Anibal O. Lleras, Alex Loynaz, Karolin Luna, Rafael Moldino, Richard Glatzer, Alexis Castillo, Jorge Blanco Cruz, Alexis Garcia, Amy Lewis, Brady Smith
